data.actual_result: Only the top few latest DMs are displayed
data.expected_result: All DMs should be displayed in the DMs list
data.short_description: Missing DMs upon exiting full screen player
data.steps_to_repro: - Look for a person playing a PC Game - Click on the game he/she is playing to view more info about the game - Play the advertising video - Make the video player go full screen - Exit full screen - Observe the DMs list on the left side of your screen
